description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rocket Fart is a strangely compelling arcade-style game where players must use gaseous emissions to stave off certain death. With lava below him, only by continuously eating food can Ignatius keep his fart meter filled enough to rocket himself to safety. Look out for the all-important golden taco.
